definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: All you have to do to win is unscramble the words here to find four names of birds.
sentences.chinese: 只要你能从这些单词中找到四种鸟的名称你就赢了。

sentences.english: An accurate description will help the Customs Authority of the country of destination to clear the products quickly.
sentences.chinese: 准确的货物名称有助于进口国海关快速清关。

sentences.english: Otherwise, the security of the strong-named assembly would be compromised.
sentences.chinese: 否则，此强式名称组件的安全性将受到威胁。

sentences.english: The name lookup services are not handled on this port.
sentences.chinese: 在该端口上不处理名称查找服务。

sentences.english: The table includes the appropriate number of columns and a corresponding name.
sentences.chinese: 表包括适当的列数和相应名称。

sentences.english: The logo must incorporate both the Chinese characters and the English name of the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 该标志必须包含两个汉字和餐厅的英文名称。

sentences.english: Select the Constant Load from the drop-down list provided.
sentences.chinese: 从提供的下拉列表中选择常量荷载名称。

sentences.english: This name for the MacAdam building principle is still in use today.
sentences.chinese: 这个名称的碎石建设原则，是目前仍在使用的。

sentences.english: From the definitive names, structural formulas can be written.
sentences.chinese: 国际定形名称，可以写出其结构式。

sentences.english: How are country name changes and unifications handled?
sentences.chinese: 如何处理国家名称变更和统一？

sentences.english: Allocates the memory and stores the linkage's name.
sentences.chinese: 分配内存并存储链接名称。

sentences.english: When used within a module, for example, the error message includes the module name and line number.
sentences.chinese: 当在模块中使用时，错误消息中包含模块名称和行号。

sentences.english: Change the name of, or any contents of, any fields in the LOINC table.
sentences.chinese: 数据库表中任何字段的名称或内容。

sentences.english: Additional words for products are materiel and goods.
sentences.chinese: 产品的其他名称有物资和物品。

sentences.english: Vendor name on a printed receipt should be in a decodable format.
sentences.chinese: 收据上的商家名称应该是可解码的格式。

definition: to give a name to/to dub/to christen/to designate/named after/naming
to mark out/to tag/to put a sign on sth explaining or calling attention to/to annotate (e.g. a character with its pinyin)
to be collectively called/collective term/general designation
variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
one's affiliation (i.e. the organization one is affiliated with)/subordinate (i.e. those subordinate to oneself)/belonging to/affiliated/under one's command
model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
